item.title: Dozens of senior officials at top U.S. aid agency put on leave: reports
item.description: At least 56 senior officials in the top U.S. aid and development agency have been placed on leave amid a probe into an alleged effort to thwart Presid...

item.title: Massive sinkhole swallows truck, trapping driver inside
item.description: The driver was able to talk with rescuers but they retreated after the area around the hole became unstable, a spokesperson said.

item.title: DJ suspended for playing song by LSU star's slain father at game
item.description: The women's basketball team's arena DJ was suspended for the choice of music played at the end of the Gamecocks' win over LSU.

item.title: RFK Jr. to face Senate confirmation hearings tomorrow. Here's what to know.
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. will answer questions from the Senate's Finance Committee on Wednesday.

item.title: Oklahoma parents enrolling kids might have to prove kids' citizenship status
